color-schemes.default_info: Used to set colors for account pages, 404 pages, and other pages or sections without color scheme settings.

custom-social-icons.info: Upload a custom icon for your favorite social network

dynamic_content.name: Dynamic content
dynamic_content.hide_block: Hide block if dynamic content is not present
dynamic_content.hide_section: Hide section if dynamic content is not present

labels.heading: Heading
labels.align_button: Align buy button to the bottom of the card

countdown_timer.name: Countdown timer
countdown_timer.label: Dynamic source
countdown_timer.info: Set a dynamic time source for the countdown timer. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/642-product-pages#countdown-timer)

dynamic_content.info: Use dynamic sources to define unique values by creating product metafields for the progress chart. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/642-product-pages#Progress-charts-86T8n)

information.label: Information
information.info: Separate label and value with a comma. Use line breaks to add a new row. Use a hyphen to indent rows. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/642-product-pages#nutritional-info)

large_size.label: Large headings
large_size.info: Affects large titles from the slider, rich text and image with text sections.

show_secondary_image.label: Show second product media on hover

header__1.info: To display ratings, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

show_preloader.label: Image preloader
show_preloader.info: Shows a small circular preloader while images on your store are still loading.

show_breadcrumb.label: Show breadcrumb
show_breadcrumb.info: Breadcrumb navigation helps users navigating through the store and shows up only on collection, product and search pages.

follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)
follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop

main.name: Sections
main.info: This setting controls the borders style on all the sections throughout the theme.

grid.name: Grid
grid.info: Affects areas with a multicolumn layout.

media.label: Aspect ratio
media.info_cart: Changes the aspect ratio for small product thumbnails used in the cart, search popup and some other areas that require small product thumbnails.

shipping.name: Shipping
shipping.info: This feature only works with a single currency and shipping method. If you're using multiple shipping methods or currencies, it might show false values to the customer.

show.label: Show free shipping minimum amount
show.info: To configure shipping rates, go to your [shipping settings](/admin/settings/shipping).

amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
amount.info: Write a number, no letters or special characters.

predictive_search.name: Predictive search
predictive_search.info: Predictive search supports suggestions for products, collections, pages and articles.

local-pickup.name: Local availability
local-pickup.info: This theme shows local availability for products. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/641-collection-page-product-grids#dynamic-text)

custom_badges.name: Custom product badges
custom_badges.info: This theme uses custom product badges that you can define here. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/639-theme-settings#product-badges)

select_icon.info: To visualize & download more icons, please visit [this link](https://resources.krownthemes.com/icons/)

social.info: To setup social profiles, go to Theme Settings > Social.
social.label: Show social icons

settings.target: Open link in a new window

map.label: Enable dynamic map
map.info: Make sure that you have the Google Maps API Key properly set in Theme Settings

zoom.label: Map zoom
zoom.info: Choose a proper value to see all the desired stores at once.

image.label: Image
image.info: Upload a static image if you don't want to use the dynamic map.

name.label: Name
name.info: The store name needs to match the name of your store defined in your [location settings](/admin/settings/locations)

closing_times.label: Closing times (optional)
closing_times.info: Add 7 lines, one for each day of the week, starting with Sunday.

timezone.label: Time zone
timezone.info: Used for properly showing closing times

map.name: Map pin
map.info: If the map is enabled, you need to define a custom pin for this address. [Learn how to get your address coordinates](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539?hl=en)

map_latitude.label: Latitude
map_latitude.info: Latitude coordinate for the marker. Example: 46.7834818

map_longitude.label: Longitude
map_longitude.info: Longitude coordinate for the marker. Example: 23.5464733

get_directions_button.label: Show "get directions" button
get_directions_button.info: Opens a bigger map in a new browser tab.

layout.label: Header layout
layout.info: Affects the position of the custom blocks & default actions
layout.option__1: Custom blocks on top, default actions on bottom
layout.option__2: Default actions on top, custom blocks on bottom

sticky.label: Sticky header
sticky.info: Shows the navigation when the user scrolls up

style.label: Style
style.info: On buttons only the caption is visible, as the button's label.

link_type.label: Open link
link_type.info: Modal windows only work with interal page links

store-selector.name: Store selector
store-selector.content: The store selector can be configured in the Store Selector section. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/640-header-the-store-selector#store-selector)
store-selector.info: This theme allows you to connect your real store locations to an interactive store selector. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/640-header-the-store-selector#store-selector)

settings.scroll_speed_info: The greater the value, the slower it scrolls

image_size.label: Desktop width
image_size.info: On mobile the image will be fullwidth.

link.info: The title will transform into a link unless there is a label for the button.

video.name: Video
video.label: MP4 Video URL
video.info: The image above will show if this video cannot be played.

settings.excerpt_limit_info: Applies if the article doesn't have a manual excerpt added in the admin.

fullwidth.label: Fullwidth
fullwidth.info: Extend the background of this section to fill the screen.

height.label: Card height
height.info: Minimum height of the card on desktop. On mobile, the height will depend on the content.

crop.label: Fill image area
crop.info: Image will crop to fill the entire height of the card on desktop. On mobile, the image will be always fully shown.

mobile.name: Mobile navigation
mobile.info: These only affect visibility inside the mobile navigation drawer.

header_info_blocks.label_1: Display store selector & info blocks in the header on mobile devices
header_info_blocks.label_2: Position info blocks on top of the first section on the homepage
header_info_blocks.label_2_info: Integrates well when the first section is a fullwidth slideshow

related-products.info: The product recommendations are based on products that are commonly purchased together or products in related collections. If there are no recommendations, the block will not appear.

products.name: Product results
products.info: The content of the product card needs to be set using the section blocks.

pickup_availability.name: Pickup availability
pickup_availability.info: This theme shows pickup availability based on selected store. Learn more

icons.name: Icons list
icons.info: To visualize & download icons included in the theme, please visit [this link](https://www.krownthemes.com/krown-icons/).
icons.help: This theme allows you to add custom product icons through dynamic content. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/639-theme-settings#dynamic-icons)

enhance_product_links.label: Enhance product links
enhance_product_links.info: All the links to products will open the product quick buy modal window.

main-article-comments.name: Article comments
main-article-comments.info: To enable comments go to your [blog settings].(/admin/blogs)

header.info: Leave empty if you want to load the default previous or next blog post.

payment.name: Payment icons
payment.info: The icons that show are determined by your store's [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments) and the customer's region and currency.

columns.name: Desktop layout
columns.info: The layout adapts itself for mobile devices.

product-quick-view.name: Quick view
product-quick-view.info: This template controls how the product quick view is built. Only this section will appear in the modal window.

text.name: Dynamic text
text.info: Use a dynamic source to highlight a unique attribute by creating a product metafield. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/641-collection-page-product-grids#dynamic-text)

icons.info: Use dynamic sources to highlight unique attributes by creating product metafields for the icon list. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/639-theme-settings#dynamic-icons)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

breadcrumbs.label: Improve product breadcrumb navigation
breadcrumbs.info: Adds collection names to the breadcrumb navigation, by duplicating product url's. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/697-seo#breadcrumbs)

seo.name: SEO
seo.label: Heading tag
seo.info: Specify heading level to help search engines index the structure of your page.

microdata.label: Disable microdata schema
microdata.info: This will remove the schema.org markup from the page. Disable only if you are using a third party app for SEO! [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/697-seo#microdata)

hotspot.mobile_info: Only if a mobile image is set

text.icons_info: To visualize & download more icons, please visit [this link](https://resources.krownthemes.com/icons/)

hotspot.label: Hotspot
hotspot.mobile_info: Only if a mobile image is set

auto_height.label: Auto height
auto_height.info_slider: Checking this option will overwrite the height settings above and make the slideshow's height responsive to the image inside each slide.

show_block.low: Display only when inventory falls below threshold

breadcrumb.name: Breadcrumb
breadcrumb.info: The breadcrumb navigation doesn't appear on the homepage

cart_upsell.name: Individual product recommendation
cart_upsell.info: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

gift_wrapping.name: Gift wrapping
gift_wrapping.info: Gift wrapping needs to be set up as a product. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/696-cart-features#gift-wrap)

gallery_resize.label: Images aspect ratio
gallery_resize.info: Videos and other types of media will be displayed in their original aspect ratio.

gallery_background.label: Gallery background
gallery_background.info: Only visible if the images are set to fit inside the container.

padding.label: Container inner spacing
padding.info: Only works if the media is set to fit inside the container.

background.label: Container background
background.info: Only visible if the media are set to fit inside the container.

thumbnails.color_swatches: Show color swatches in product card
thumbnails.color_swatches_on_hover: Show color swatches in product card (on hover)

color_swatches_label.label: Color swatches labels
color_swatches_label.info: Write multiple option names (separated by commas) that you want to become color swatches.

custom_badges.name: Custom product badges
custom_badges.info: This theme uses custom product badges that you can define here. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/564-product-pages#product-badges)
custom_badges.split_info: This theme uses custom product badges that you can define here. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/377-collection-pages#product-badges)

hr.label: Show horizontal rules
hr.info: Displays a small visual horizontal rule on some titles

preloader.label: Media preloader
preloader.info: Shows a small circular preloader while media on your store are still loading.

breadcrumb.label: Show breadcrumb
breadcrumb.info: Breadcrumb navigation helps users to navigate through the store and shows up only on collection, product, search & account pages.

animation_style.label: Caption display (desktop)
animation_style.info: On mobile, the caption will always be visible for better UX

quick_buy.name: Quick buy
quick_buy.info: Adds an instant "add to cart" button. If the product has variants, it will display a "quick buy" popup.
quick_buy.label: Enable quick buy

collections_menu.info: This has a bold design, especially in the classic menu style, where it transforms into a mega menu with the possibility of adding images and a promotion.

show_images.label: Show collection images
show_images.info: Only applies if the parent items is a collection.

show.label: Show promotion block
show.info: In minimal style it shows at the bottom of the menu drawer. In classic style it shows in the collections menu, if present.

header.label: Product header
header.info: On mobile devices the product header will always appear at the top, above the product gallery.

gallery_aspect.label: Scale slider images to fit the viewport
gallery_aspect.info: On mobile, images will always fit the device's viewport.

color_swatches.label: Show color swatches (only for block style)
color_swatches.info: This theme can show custom images for color swatches. [Learn more](https://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/554-using-color-swatches)

api.label: Google Maps API key
api.info: You'll need to register a [Google Maps API Key](http://shopify-support.krownthemes.com/article/385-generate-an-api-key-for-google-maps) to display the map.

image.label: Image
image.info: If you want to add a custom image for the collection.

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

icons.label: Icons
icons.info: To visualize all the icons included in the theme, please visit [this link](https://krownthemes.com/krown-icons/)

language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

menu_1.label: First menu
menu_1.info: This menu won't show dropdown items

labels.label: Label
labels.info: Make sure that all of your fields have unique labels!

url.label: Link
url.info: The entire block will transform into a link unless there is a label for the button

aspect_ratio.label: Images aspect ratio
aspect_ratio.info: When using the natural aspect ratio, make sure that you resize your thumbnails at the same size, for a clean grid design. Using one of the cropped setting, all thumbnails will be resized to the same dimension.

style_mobile.label: Turn gallery into a slider on mobile

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

mobile_design.label: Turn the vertical slider into a horizontal one on mobile

link.label: Link
link.info: Unless there is a label for the button, the link will be on the text.

image.label: Fallback image
image.info: A fallback image will be used on mobile devices where autoplay might be disabled.

header__1.info: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

open_first.label: Have the first toggle opened by default

image.label: Image
image.info: 1240 x 400px .jpg recommended. It only appears on desktop

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

low_inventory_notification.label: Inventory notification
low_inventory_notification.info: Variants need to have inventory tracking enabled in order for this feature to work. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/track_inventory)

options__2.label: Show a notice if inventory falls below 5

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the pages featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky product information on large screens

gallery_slider_style.label: Scale slider images to fit the viewport

gallery_style.label: Gallery style
gallery_style.info: Defaults to slider for mobile devices
